titles.title: A resolution designating August 11, 2007, as "National Marina Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 194.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
6/20/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Commemorates the marinas of the United States for providing environmentally friendly gateways to boating for the citizens of, and the visitors to, the United States.
Designates August 11, 2007, as the sixth annual National Marina Day.
